It is also possible to compute PV of an uneven cash flow stream by using the cash flow
(CF) keys and the net present value (NPV) function on your calculator. This procedure
is illustrated in the tables in Figures 3 and 4. In Figure 3, we have omitted the F01, F02,
etc. values because they are all equal to 1. The Fn variable indicates how many times a
particular cash flow amount is repeated.
